title: OJS ML/AI Resource Requirements
description: Resource requirements for ML/AI workloads. These are declared in the job's meta.resources field and enable resource-aware scheduling. Backends that do not support resource matching MUST ignore these fields.

gpu.title: GPU Requirements
gpu.description: GPU compute requirements for the job.

count.title: GPU Count
count.description: Number of GPUs required. Default is 0 (no GPU needed).

type.title: GPU Type
type.description: GPU model identifier. When specified, the job will only be dispatched to workers with matching GPU hardware.

memory_gb.title: GPU Memory (GB)
memory_gb.description: Minimum GPU memory per device in gigabytes.

cpu.title: CPU Requirements
cpu.description: CPU compute requirements for the job.

cores.title: CPU Cores
cores.description: Minimum number of CPU cores required.

storage_gb.title: Scratch Storage (GB)
storage_gb.description: Minimum scratch disk storage in gigabytes for temporary data.
